item.title: Surface Intelligence in Die Casting Using Spatially Resolved Fluorescence Measurement
item.description: Fraunhofer IPM develops a fluorescence laser scanner for measuring release agent application in die casting, enabling precise process control and improved component quality.

item.title: Apera Evolves 4D Vision Robotics
item.description: Apera AI updates its 4D Vision-guided robotics platform with Vue 9.52, featuring programmable motion control, visualized TCP accuracy tools, and faster AI training to improve industrial automation reliability.

item.title: Intelligent Automation Comes to Rail Wheel Ultrasonic Inspection
item.description: Waygate Technologies introduces the Krautkrämer WheelStar RPS, a fully automated ultrasonic testing system for rail wheels that utilizes robotics and matrix phased array technology for precise inspection.
